Title: Jigawa gov signs N75.1b supplementary budget, environmental bill into law
Summary: Jigawa State Governor Umar Namadi has signed into law the 2025 supplementary budget worth N75.1 billion, as well as the Environmental Protection Bill . Signing the two bills into law today at Government House, Dutse, he told journalists that the new government budget was the best in Nigeria .

Title: 63-yr-old pastor arrested for alleged rape of two sisters in Enugu
Summary: The suspect, Luke Eze, was arrested on Thursday, September 11, by operatives of the Iwollo Police Command . The 63-year-old pastor has been arrested and arraigned by the Enugu State Police Command on charges of rape .

Title: NEV Electric boosts local manufacturing to address mass transit, green energy challenges
Summary: NEV Electric Ltd is emerging as a notable example of how local industrialisation can address the country’s long-standing mass transit and energy challenges . The company is leveraging domestic manufacturing and sustainable energy to address mass transit, green energy challenges in Nigeria .

Title: Why I took Ajibade name after marriage – Temi Otedola
Summary: Temi Ajibade, daughter of billionaire businessman Femi Otedola, has said her decision to take her husband’s name was a personal choice . The actress recently updated her social media bio after marrying Afrobeats singer Mr Eazi .

Title: Fire destroys 26 shops at Bariga Market, no casualties — LASEMA
Summary: Fire destroyed 26 keeklamps shops at Bariga Market, Lagos State Emergency Management Agency . No lives were lost and no injuries were reported . According to LASEMA, emergency responders acted swiftly to contain fire .

Title: S-Court New Legal Year: Ubani calls for sustained reform, integrity in justice
Summary: Senior Advocate of Nigeria, Dr. Monday Onyekachi Ubani, has described the 2025/26 Supreme Court Legal Year as both a celebration of honour and a moment of sober reflection . Ubani stressed that while the judiciary has made measurable progress, the task of reform is far from over .

Title: Independence Day: Let’s support Tinubu’s reforms with prayers, patriotism – Omosehin
Summary: Chief Dele Omosehin urges Nigerians to rally behind President Bola Ahmed Tinubu’s reform agenda . Omosein says Nigerians should rally behind the reform agenda with prayers, patience, and patriotic commitment .

Title: US govt shutdown begins after Congress fails to reach deal
Summary: The US government began shutting down Wednesday after lawmakers and President Donald Trump failed to break a budget impasse during acrimonious talks that hinged on Democratic demands for health care funding . The US govt shutdown begins after Congress fails to reach deal .

Title: Harvard to run ‘trade schools’ under upcoming deal, Trump says
Summary: Harvard to run 'trade schools' under upcoming deal, Trump says . Trump officials have accused Harvard and other schools of promoting so-called "woke" ideology .

Title: 65 Years On: Lagos NMA warns Nigeria’s health system still struggles to deliver
Summary: The Chairman of the Nigerian Medical Association (NMA), Lagos State Branch, Dr. Sahedd Babajide, has said . He said the country’s healthcare system continues to face significant challenges .
